EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Confidence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +1% Dodge, +1 Reflex Save, and +1 to the Max Dex Bonus of your Armor per Swashbuckler Core Ability you have.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Swashbuckling
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Swashbuckling: Stance: You gain 1% Doublestrike and Doubleshot as well as +1 to the Enhancement Bonus of the weapon in your main hand. Swashbuckling requires wielding a Finesseable or Thrown weapon in your main hand, wielding a Buckler or nothing in your off hand, and wearing Light Armor or no armor. (Druids cannot Swashbuckle while in animal forms.) (For Warforged and Bladeforged, you must be using either the Composite Plating or Mithral Body feats).
Passive: While Swashbuckling, the following weapons receive Competence bonuses to their critical profiles (critical threat range bonuses doubled with the appropriate Improved Critical feat, but not with keen or impact):
Dagger, Shortsword, Throwing Dagger: +1 Threat Range, +1 Multiplier Light Mace, Light Hammer, Kama, Sickle, Dart, Shuriken, Throwing Axe, Throwing Hammer: +2 Threat Range, +1 Multiplier Kukri, Rapier: +1 Multiplier Handaxe: +2 Range Light Pick: +1 Range

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Uncanny Dodge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Uncanny Dodge: You gain the Uncanny Dodge feat. Passive: Swashbuckling grants an additional 1% Doublestrike, 1% Doubleshot, and +1 Attack and Damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Panache
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Panache: While Swashbuckling, you have an additional 1% Doublestrike, 1% Doubleshot, +1 Attack Damage, +1 Reflex Saving Throw, and the weapon in your main hand gains an additional +1 to its Enhancement bonus.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Roll with the Punches
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Roll with the Punches: While Swashbuckling, you gain +5 Insight Bonus to Character Dodge Cap, the Slippery Mind feat, +1% Doublestrike, 1% Doubleshot and +1 Attack and Damage

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Evasive Maneuvers
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Evasive Maneuvers: +2 Charisma, +2 Dexterity. While Swashbuckling, you gain the Evasion feat, +1% Doublestrike, 1% Doubleshot, +1 Attack Damage, and the weapon in your main hand gains an additional +1 to its Enhancement bonus.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Blow By Blow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either a Melee or Ranged attack:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Blow By Blow
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Critical Threat Range Melee attack: On Damage: [1/2/3]d6 extra Sonic damage, and reduces your threat with nearby enemies by [100/200/300]. Cooldown: 12 seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Blow By Blow (Ranged)
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Critical Threat Range Ranged attack: On Damage: [1/2/3]d6 extra Sonic damage, and reduces your threat with nearby enemies by [100/200/300]. Cooldown: 12 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Insults
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an Insult that debuffs the saves of nearby enemies.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Appalling Diatribe
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to reduce the Reflex saves of nearby enemies by 3. Costs: [16/12/8] SP Cooldown: [20/15/10] seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Cutting Jibes
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to reduce the Will saves of nearby enemies by 3. Costs: [16/12/8] SP Cooldown: [20/15/10] seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Scathing Words
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to reduce the Fortitude saves of nearby enemies by 3. Costs: [16/12/8] SP Cooldown: [20/15/10] seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Tavern Shanties
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Bard Songs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Limber Up
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Balance, Swim, and Tumble. Rank 3: When you Tumble, you gain +3 to saves against traps for 6 seconds. 12 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: En Pointe
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Deals +[10/20/30]% Damage +[4/8/12] Critical Threat Range Melee Attack: Make two attacks -1 Critical Multiplier. Costs 10 Spell Points to activate. Cooldown: 12 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Deflect Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the benefits of the Deflect Arrows feat, knocking aside one incoming projectile that would have struck you every 6 seconds. (Anti-requisite Deflect Arrows)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Fast Movement
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You run 1% faster for each of your Bard levels.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Sword Dance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Swashbuckling, when enemies miss you in combat, you deal 1d[10/12/20] Sonic Damage. This Sonic damage scales with spell power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Action Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a Doubleshot or a Doublestrike action boost bonus: (Cooldown: 30 Seconds)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Doubleshot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain +[10/20/30]% Action Boost bonus to Doubleshot for 20 seconds. Usable 5 times per rest.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Doublestrike
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain +[10/20/30]% Action Boost bonus to Doublestrike for 20 seconds. Usable 5 times per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Elegant Footwork
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When enemies miss you while Swashbuckling, they have a 20% chance to be knocked down with no save. Cooldown: 12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Swashbuckling Style
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select your Swashbuckling style: Open Hand, Buckler, Orb or Rune Arm.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Arcane Marauder
EnhancementSelection.Description: Passive: You can now Swashbuckle with an Orb in your off hand. (Does not count as a Buckler for Buckler-specific abilities). Requires Magical Training (or the Enhancement equivalent)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Cannoneer
EnhancementSelection.Description: Passive: You can now Swashbuckle with a Rune Arm in your off hand. (Does not count as a Buckler for Buckler-specific abilities).

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dashing Scoundrel
EnhancementSelection.Description: Passive: While Swashbuckling with nothing in your off hand, you gain +1 Attack Damage per 5 Character levels and 10% Doublestrike/Doubleshot.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Skirmisher
EnhancementSelection.Description: Passive: While Swashbuckling with a Buckler in your off hand, you gain 10% Dodge, and you may use a Buckler and still benefit from the Single Weapon Fighting line of feats.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Resonant Arms
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Imbue Toggle: While Swashbuckling, the Finesseable or thrown Weapon in your main hand deals an additional 1d6 Sonic Damage. This Sonic damage scales with Spell Power.

Stance.Name: Swashbuckler: Resonant Arms
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: While Swashbuckling, the Finesseable or thrown Weapon in your main hand deals an additional 1d6 Sonic Damage. This Sonic damage scales with Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Different Tack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose to use either Charisma, Dexterity or Intelligence modifier for damage when single weapon fighting:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Smooth Flourishes
EnhancementSelection.Description: You get Charisma to Damage with weapon attacks while Single Weapon Fighting

EnhancementSelection.Name: Swift Strikes
EnhancementSelection.Description: You get Dexterity to Damage with weapon attacks while Single Weapon Fighting.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Two Steps Ahead
EnhancementSelection.Description: You get Intelligence to Damage with weapon attacks Single Weapon Fighting

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Charisma or Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: On the Mark
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive +[1/2/3] to attack rolls to confirm critical hits and damage on critical hits (before weapon multipliers)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Swashbuckling Style II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improve your Swashbuckling Style

EnhancementSelection.Name: Loud and Clear
EnhancementSelection.Description: Passive: While Swashbuckling with an Orb in your off hand, +20 Sonic Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Low Blow
EnhancementSelection.Description: While Swashbuckling and wielding a Buckler in your off hand, activate to perform a shield bash with +2 Critical Threat Range and Multiplier. On hit, knock down affected enemy for three seconds (Perform + d20 saves for the Knockdown). Costs 10 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Music Box
EnhancementSelection.Description: Passive: While Swashbuckling with a Rune Arm in your off hand, your Rune Arm Weapon Imbue deals an additional 1d6 Sonic damage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Slap in the Face
EnhancementSelection.Description: While Swashbuckling and wielding nothing in your off hand, activate to deal 1 Bludgeon damage. Damaged enemies can't cast spells for 6 seconds and are stunned for three seconds (Perform + d20 saves for the Stun). 18 second cooldown. Costs 10 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Battering Barrage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Swashbuckling, hits inflict Destruction/Improved Destruction.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Wind at my Back
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to the Enhancement Bonus of your equipped Throwing Weapons, plus an additional +1 for every five Bard levels.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Charisma or Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Thread the Needle
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Swashbuckling, +5 Damage and +5% to hit while the Precision feat is active.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Coup de Grace
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Deals +30% Damage Multi-selector, Melee or Ranged Attack: Make an attack with +30% damage. This instantly kills enemies that are Dancing, Dazed, Fascinated, Mesmerized, Paralyzed, Petrified, Sleeping, Stunned, or Tripped, unless they succeed a Fortitude save (d20 + your Perform skill). Cooldown: 20 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Second Skin
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Swashbuckling, +[1/2/3] to your Reflex Saves and +[2/4/6] to the Max Dex Bonus of your Armor. Rank 3: +20% competence bonus to hit points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Exploit Weaknesses
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Swashbuckling, every time you damage an enemy but do not critically hit, you gain a stacking +1 Insight Bonus to Critical Threat Range until you successfully critically hit.
